titleStmt.title: Vox regis & regni, or, A protest against Vox cleri, and a perswasive thereby occasion'd to make such alterations as may give ease to our dissenting brethren
titleStmt.author: Long, Thomas, 1621-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for G.C. and are to be sold by Richard Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Thomas Long. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
